name: Money Changer
description: A specialist who exchanges different currencies and precious metals; adventurers can convert foreign coin, appraise treasure, or learn about regional monetary systems.
atmosphere: The establishment has a secure, professional atmosphere with the scent of metal coins and the sound of careful counting. The air carries the promise of financial security and the essential nature of currency exchange, while the atmosphere crackles with the energy of international commerce and the importance of trusted financial services.
